Description:

Broken Sword the Serpent's Curse Adventure - point'n'click adventure detective 
story telling George Stobbarta and Nicole Collard. The New Adventures of an American 
lawyer and an independent French journalist tell a story that has nothing to do with 
a series of other projects.
During an armed raid on a Paris gallery was stolen by a mysterious painting, and our 
heroes have to investigate. Traveling from Paris to London, they encounter with the 
dark forces, to meet with old and new characters, as well as reveal an ancient conspiracy.
